identity.name: PetCare Governance UI
principles: Data is the Art: The UI frames the data, it doesn't compete with it.
Swiss Precision: Grids are sacred. Alignment is absolute.
High Contrast: Black on White. No muddy grays for text.
Tactile Utility: Buttons feel clickable, cards feel physical (subtle borders).

buttons.primary: bg-slate-900 text-white hover:bg-slate-800 shadow-sm rounded-md px-4 py-2 font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-slate-900 border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50 shadow-sm rounded-md px-4 py-2 font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.ghost: text-slate-600 hover:text-slate-900 hover:bg-slate-100 rounded-md px-3 py-2 transition-colors

cards.base: bg-white border border-slate-200 rounded-xl shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-200

badges.base: inline-flex items-center px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium border

tables.header: bg-slate-50 text-left text-xs font-medium text-slate-500 uppercase tracking-wider border-b border-slate-200
tables.row: bg-white hover:bg-slate-50 transition-colors border-b border-slate-100 last:border-0

assets.icons: Use Lucide React icons (already installed). Use 'Shield', 'FileText', 'Activity', 'Lock', 'Search', 'Menu', 'X', 'ChevronRight', 'CheckCircle', 'AlertTriangle'.

visual_enhancers.noise: opacity-50 mix-blend-overlay pointer-events-none fixed inset-0 z-50
visual_enhancers.gradients: Avoid large gradients. Use subtle 'spotlight' gradients on hover or active states only.

instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Manrope' for all headings. Import it from Google Fonts or use a system fallback that is robust.
Implement a 'Bento Grid' layout for the Dashboard overview.
Use 'Recharts' for any data visualization (Audit events over time, etc.).
Ensure all tables have sortable headers and pagination if data is large (mock pagination if needed).
The 'Evidence Packs' should look like physical folders or secure data packets - use icons and borders to convey this.
For the 'Markdown Report Viewer', use a clean prose typography plugin style (max-w-prose, prose-slate).
Strictly follow the 'Light Mode' constraint. No dark mode toggle.
Use 'sonner' for all toast notifications (success/error actions).
universal_guidelines: Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Never use AI assistant Emoji characters.
